text: Jacob M. Landau (20 March 1924 – 12 November 2020) was a Moldovan-born Israeli political scientist. He was Professor Emeritus in the Department of Political Science (in the field of Middle Eastern Studies) at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem. he was born in Chișinău, Moldova. In 2005, he won the Israel Prize. Landau died on 16 November 2020 in Jerusalem at the age of 96.Passing of Prof. Jacob M. Landau ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Israeli educators Category:Moldovan people Category:Israeli political scientists
title: Jacob M. Landau
